name: SpunchBop: Squidward's Addiction! ALPHA 2.5
description:
BETA 1.0 -

Added background

Added Music Player

Removed options

Removed Squidbrine

(game description)

Play as SpunchBop to help beat Squidward's Addiction of MORBIUS!

Find all of Morbin' Morbius movies, so Squidward will have a better taste in movies!
But watch out for pickles! And collect Benadryl to increase health!
